content: शिखरिणी {@--1@} An excellent woman. {@--2@} A dish of curds and sugar with spices. {@--3@} A line of hair extending across the navel. {@--4@} A kind of vine. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (मूर्वा) {@--6@} Arabian jasmine. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre; see App. I.

शिखरिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शिखरं अस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Crested, tufted. {@--2@} Pointed, peaked; शिखरिदशना <ls>Me. 82.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A mountain; इतश्व शरणर्थिनां शिखरिणां गणाः शेरते <ls>Bh. 2. 76</ls>; <ls>Me. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 12</ls>, <ls n="R. 9.">17.</ls> {@--2@} A hill-fort. {@--3@} A tree. {@--4@} The lapwing. {@--5@} The plant अपामार्ग.
